translations: v．翻新，擦亮，修复：对物品进行清洁、修复或改善，使其看起来更新更好。
· He furbished the old furniture to make it look new.
他翻新了旧家具，使其看起来焕然一新。

sentences.sentence: Buy used or re-furbished products - used books save trees and re-furbished electronics save you money.
sentences.translation: 买二手的或者翻新的物品——用二手的书可以解救树木，翻新的电器节省你的金钱。

sentences.sentence: Son of man, prophesy, and say, Thus saith the LORD; say, a sword, a sword is sharpened, and also furbished.
sentences.translation: 人子阿，你要预言。耶和华吩咐我如此说，有刀，有刀，是磨快擦亮的。
